name: HowMuchTimeWeGotLeft
0:
”Alexa, open Time deadline”
”Alexa, start Time deadline”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: time deadline
des:
Open the skill and Alexa will automatically tell you how many days remain until all your upcoming events, goals, To do bys, get a certain amount of money by, literally anything that you need a reminder of how much time is left til your eventful day or not so eventful, She's got your back. Alexa can also remind you about the exact date for a specific events. If your memory just isn't that great, you got a million things going on, trying to teach your kids dates, or you just like a good old don't forget this specific date then bam! She's got you covered!
 Anyone who needs that extra reminder for absolutely anything with a date then this is for you!!
